description: This file defines an Angular component 'AuthComponent' responsible for handling user authentication through login or signup modes. It manages user input, validates it, and emits events for authentication actions.

classes.name: AuthComponent
classes.description: Angular component managing user authentication input and actions, with properties for email, password, authentication mode, and event emitters for login and signup.

methods.name: doAuth
methods.description: Handles the authentication process; validates input fields and emits the appropriate event based on the current auth mode.

ctags.name: login
ctags.pattern: /^  @Output() login = new EventEmitter<{ email: string, password: string }>();$/

fields.name: @Output() login = new EventEmitter<{ email: string, password: string }>();
